snippet.title: Gunpoint: a game about rewiring things and punching people
snippet.description:
See: http://www.pentadact.com/2011-11-28-gunpoint-trailer-let-me-talk-you-through-some-ridiculous-solutions/

It's been eight months since the first Gunpoint video, and it looks rather different now, so I've made a new trailer. In it, I talk you through the basics and then some of the most complicated solutions I've come up with to the levels, just to give you an idea of the stupid stuff you can do when you mess around with Crosslinking.

Something I forgot to mention in the blurb at the end: if you write about games and want to write about Gunpoint, mail me at pentadact@gmail.com and I can send you a playable build next time I have one ready for previewing. It should be pretty soon now.
